name: Updates
description:
Start with nothing…

Your CPU crashed and your game is now showing only binary code! Don’t worry, you can collect updates in the game and unlock the graphics and audio. BUT be careful - if an enemy hits you, you will lose your progress and you will have to install them again!

Hints: When you hear the witch laugh, stop moving! 

Frankenstain is surely big, will he still be big in binary form?

INSTRUCTIONS:

Please play in full screen

Move with W A S D 

Code by Marco Minganna - https://www.marcominganna.com

Graphics by Lucia Paganini - https://lucisaurus.com

Audio by free online resources - www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRlcYMiHtE8 www.youtube.com/watch?v=ChbWFvZATFA

We hope you enjoy our game, thanks for dropping by!
